channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Stakes on Immigration
item.description: We cover the presidential candidates’ immigration policies.

item.title: Anxiety Mounts as Lebanon Reels From Pager and Walkie-Talkie Attacks
item.description: People across the country were avoiding their cellphones and unplugging baby monitors and laptops, after two days of attacks on Hezbollah-owned device...

item.title: News site that debunked story about immigrants supposedly eating dogs and cats of Springfield won’t back down from harassment and hate messages
item.description: Haitian Times has debunked and aggressively covered the aftermath of the claims spread by Donald Trump and JD Vance.

item.title: Harris Ahead in Pennsylvania and Tied Nationally? Unpacking an Unexpected Result.
item.description: Although it could simply reflect the normal variation of polling results, it may also point to a declining Trump edge in the Electoral College.

item.title: They Said the Virgin Mary Appeared. The Vatican Is Finally Weighing In.
item.description: After decades, and controversy, the Vatican has authorized public worship at a shrine in Bosnia, where a once tranquil village has become a major pilg...

item.title: Everyday Americans pay the price for the bipartisan consensus on protectionist trade policies
item.description: Donald Trump and Kamala Harris should stop following populist rhetoric—and work on real policies that address competitors.

item.title: Israel and Hezbollah trade missile fire across the Lebanese border after the exploding device attacks.

item.title: How Rupert Murdoch’s fight to wrestle control from his kids turned into a real-life ‘Succession’ courtroom thriller
item.description: The question of who will take over Murdoch’s massive conservative media empire has resurfaced because of a court case that began Sept. 16 in Reno, Nev...

item.title: Their Countries Are at War. These Couples Are Still Together.
item.description: Relationships between Ukrainians and Russians have long been common. Russia’s invasion has brought stigma, separation, legal troubles and a reconsider...

item.title: Why I started ‘VCs for Kamala’
item.description: The pledge of support for Kamala Harris has drawn signatures from 850-plus VCs representing over $300 billion in assets.

item.title: Polls Find Harris-Trump Deadlock, and Device Attacks Spread Fear in Lebanon
item.description: Plus, legal problems for MrBeast’s reality show.

item.title: Methane Levels Still Rising, Despite Global Methane Pledge
item.description: Satellite data shows the U.S. releasing more and more of the potent greenhouse gas into the atmosphere, researchers said, despite pledges to cut back.

item.title: Exclusive: Female-led Drift raises $25 million to expand Solana exchange and become ‘Robinhood of crypto’
item.description: Multicoin Capital led the round with participation from Blockchain Capital, Primitive Ventures, and Folius Ventures.
